responseA: The label features an illustration of a humanoid figure with a skull for a face, suggesting it is a stylized representation or artistic personification, reminiscent of skeletal characters celebrated during events like the Day of the Dead. There is also a smaller figure that appears to be a dog, also with a skeletal depiction, sitting in the basket of the bicycle that the humanoid figure is riding. These are artistic renderings and not real animals or humans. I am very certain (1) about my assessment of this image.
